001package ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.msg;
002
003import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.net.ByteStream;
004import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.protocol.ProtocolId;
005
006/**
007 * Event emitted by a protocol reconstructor representing a logical request or response.
008 *
009 * @param protocol protocol associated with the event
010 * @param type message direction (request/response)
011 * @param payload byte stream context from which the message was derived
012 * @param metadata additional attributes such as headers or screen coordinates
013 * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
014 */
015public record MessageEvent(
016    ProtocolId protocol,
017    MessageType type,
018    ByteStream payload,
019    MessageMetadata metadata) {}
